name: MUGDHA DHNANJAY Dixit
resume_snippet: MUGDHA DHNANJAY Dixit  Experienced and proficient Quality Assurance (QA) professional with over 12 years of experience in Good Manufacturing Practice (GMP), Good Distribution Practices (GDP), Good Laboratory Practice (GLP) and Good Clinical Practice (GCP) verticals. Conducted over 250 in- house and external audits and assessments in Europe, Middle East and APAC. Worked with distinct stakeholders such as Pharma Manufacturing units, Contract Research Organisations (CROs) and Independent Clinical Q
